Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cermak/57th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Austin, 16th, Central & Cermak, due to street blockage near Cermak/57th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Austin, 16th, Central, then resume their normal route on Cermak, due to street blockage near Cermak/57th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
